anya-e0802n2:5: Yathā yathā jinavacanayuttaṃ hi liṅgaṃ, tathā tathā idha liṅgañca nippajjate.
anya-e0802n2:6: Taṃ yathā? Eso no satthā, brahmā attā, sakhā, rājā.
anya-e0802n2:8: Tato jinavacanayuttehi liṅgehi vibhattiyo parā honti.
anya-e0802n2:9: 55, 63.Si yo, aṃ yo, nā hi, sa naṃ, smā hi, sa naṃ, smiṃ su.
anya-e0802n2:10: Kā ca pana tāyo vibhattiyo? Si, yo iti paṭhamā, aṃ, yoiti dutiyā, nā hi iti tatiyā, sa, naṃiti catutthī, smā, hi iti pañcamī, sa, naṃ iti chaṭṭhī, smiṃ, su iti sattamī.
anya-e0802n2:11: Vibhattiiccanena kvattho? Amhassa mamaṃ savibhattissa se.
anya-e0802n2:13: Yathā yathā tesaṃ jinavacanānaṃ anuparodho. Tathā tathā idha liṅgañca nippajjate.
anya-e0802n2:16: Bhoti ayye, bhoti kaññe, bhoti kharādiye.
anya-e0802n2:22: Isino , aggino, gahapatino, daṇḍino. Setuno, ketuno, bhikkhuno. Sayambhuno, abhibhuno.
anya-e0802n2:23: Jhalaiccanena kvattho? Jhalato sassa no vā.
anya-e0802n2:25: Te ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā yadā itthikhyā, tadā pasaññā honti.
anya-e0802n2:30: Ākāro yadā itthikhyo, tadā ghasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n2:31: Saddhāya, kaññāya, vīṇāya, gaṅgāya, disāya sālāya, mālāya, tulāya, dolāya, pabhāya, sobhāya, paññāya, karuṇāya nāvāya, kapālikāya.
anya-e0802n2:33: Itthikhyoti kimatthaṃ? Satthārā desito ayaṃ dhammo.
anya-e0802n2:37: Purisassa, aggissa, isissa, daṇḍissa, bhikkhussa, sayambhussa, abhibhussa.
anya-e0802n2:41: Etissaṃ, etissā imissaṃ, imissā, tissaṃ, tissā,
anya-e0802n2:42: Tassaṃ tassā, yassaṃ, yassā, amussaṃ, amussā.
anya-e0802n2:47: Etāimāiccetesamanto saro ikāro hoti saṃsāsu ekavacanesu vibhattādesesu.
anya-e0802n2:52: Tassā itthiyaṃ vattamānassa antassa ākārassa ikāro hoti vā saṃsāsu ekavacanesu vibhattādesesu.
anya-e0802n2:55: Tato tā etā imāto sassa vibhattissa ssāyādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:60: Tassaṃ, tassā, yassaṃ, yassā, sabbassaṃ, sabbassā.
anya-e0802n2:64: Dviiccevamādito saṅkhyāto nakārāgamo hoti naṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:65: Dvinnaṃ, tinnaṃ, catunnaṃ, pañcannaṃ, channaṃ, sattannaṃ, aṭṭhannaṃ, navannaṃ, dasannaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:68: Caggahaṇenassañcāgamo hoti. Catassannaṃ itthīnaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:70: Paiccetasmā smiṃsmāiccetesaṃ aṃāādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:71: Matyaṃ, matiyaṃ, matyā, matiyā, nikatyaṃ. Nikatiyaṃ, nikatyā, nikatiyā, vikatyaṃ, vikatiyaṃ, vikatyā, vikatiyā, viratyaṃ, viratiyaṃ, viratyā, viratiyā, ratyaṃ, ratiyaṃ, ratyā, ratiyā, puthabyaṃ, puthaviyaṃ, puthabyā, puthaviyā, pavatyaṃ, pavatyā, pavattiyaṃ, pavattiyā.
anya-e0802n2:75: Vāti kimatthaṃ? Ādismiṃ, ādimhi nāthaṃ namassitvāna,
anya-e0802n2:76: Caggahaṇena aññasmāpi smiṃ vacanassa ā o aṃādesā honti. Divā ca ratto ca haranti ye bali. Bārāṇasiṃ ahu rājā.
anya-e0802n2:78: Jhalaiccetesaṃ iya uvaiccete ādesā honti vā sare pare yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:79: Tiyantaṃ pacchiyāgāre, aggiyāgāre, bhikkhuvāsane nisīdati, vuthuvāsane nisīdati.
anya-e0802n2:80: Sareti kimatthaṃ? Timalaṃ, tiphalaṃ, ticatukkaṃ, tidaṇḍaṃ, tilokaṃ, tinayanaṃ, tipāsaṃ, tihaṃsaṃ, tibhavaṃ, tikhandhaṃ, tipiṭakaṃ, tivedanaṃ, catuddisaṃ, puthubhūtaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:82: Vāti vikappanatthaṃ, ikārassa ayādeso hoti, vatthuttayaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:84: Jhalānaṃ yakāra vakārādesā honti sare pare yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:88: Pasaññassa ca ivaṇṇassa vibhattādese sare pare yakārādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:92: Goiccetassa okārassa āvādeso hoti se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:95: Goiccetassa okārassa āvādeso hoti yoiccetesu paresu.
anya-e0802n2:96: Gāvo gacchanti, gāvo passanti, gāvī gacchanti, gāvī passanti.
anya-e0802n2:97: Caggahaṇaṃ kimatthaṃ? Nāsmāsmiṃsu vacanesu āvā deso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:100: Goiccetassa okārassa āvaavaiccete ādesā honti aṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:102: Caggahaṇena sādisesesu pubbuttavacanesu goiccetassa okārassa avādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:103: Gavassa, gavo, gavena, gavā, gave, gavesu.
anya-e0802n2:105: Āvaiccetassa gāvādesassa anta sarassa ukārādeso hoti vā aṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:109: Tato gosaddato naṃvacanassa aṃādeso hoti, goiccetassa okārassa avādeso hoti patimhi pare alutte ca samāse.
anya-e0802n2:112: Caggahaṇena asamāsepi naṃvacanassa aṃādeso hoti, goiccetassa okārassa avādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:115: Goiccetassa okārassa avādeso hoti samāse ca sare pare.
anya-e0802n2:117: Caggahaṇena uvaṇṇaiccevamantānaṃ liṅgānaṃ uvaavaurādesā honti smiṃyoiccetesu kvaci.
anya-e0802n2:121: Tassa avasaddassa yadā upapade tiṭṭhamānassa tassa okārassa viparīto hoti byañjane pare.
anya-e0802n2:125: Sabbasseva gosaddassa goṇādeso hoti vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:129: Sabbā gāvī ujuṃ yanti, nette ujuṃ gate sati.
anya-e0802n2:132: Suhināiccetesu sabbassa gosaddassa goṇādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:134: Vāti kimatthaṃ? Gosu, gohi, gobhi, gavena.
anya-e0802n2:135: Caggahaṇena syādisesesu pubbuttaravacanesupi goṇa gu gavayādesā honti. Goṇo, goṇā, goṇaṃ, goṇe, goṇassa, goṇamhā. Goṇamhi, gunnaṃ, gavayehi, gavayebhi.
anya-e0802n2:137: Aṃvacanassa makārassa ca jhalapaiccetehi niggahitaṃ hoti
anya-e0802n2:138: Aggiṃ, isiṃ, gahapatiṃ, daṇḍiṃ, mahesiṃ, bhikkhuṃ, paṭuṃ, sayambhuṃ, abhibhuṃ, rattiṃ, itthiṃ, vadhuṃ, pulliṅgaṃ, pumbhāvo, puṅkokilo.
anya-e0802n2:139: Aṃmoti kimatthaṃ? Agginā, pāṇinā, bhikkhunā, rattiyā, itthiyā, vadhuyā.
anya-e0802n2:141: Punārambha haṇaṃ vibhāsānivattanatthaṃ. Aggiṃ, paṭuṃ, buddhiṃ, vadhuṃ.
anya-e0802n2:143: Saralopo hoti amādesapaccayādimhi sara lope tu pakati hoti.
anya-e0802n2:144: Purisaṃ, purise, pāpaṃ, pāpe, pāpiyo, pāpiṭṭho.
anya-e0802n2:145: Amādesapaccayādimhīti ki tthaṃ? Appamādo amataṃ padaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:148: Pakatiggahaṇasāmatthena puna sandhibhāvo ca hoti. Seyyo, seṭṭho, jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
anya-e0802n2:151: Itthiṃ, itthiyo, itthiyā. Vadhuṃ, vadhuyo, vadhuyā. Daṇḍiṃ, daṇḍino, daṇḍinā. Sayambhuṃ, sayambhuvo, sayambhunā.
anya-e0802n2:157: Sismiṃ anapuṃsakāni liṅgāni na rassamāpajjante. Itthī, bhikkhunī, vadhū, daṇḍī, sayambhū.
anya-e0802n2:158: Sismiṃnti kimatthaṃ? Bhoti itthi, bhoti vadhu, bho daṇḍi, bho sayambhu.
anya-e0802n2:159: Anapuṃsakānīti kimatthaṃ? Sukhakāri dānaṃ, sukhakāri sīlaṃ, sīghayāyi cittaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:165: Naṃvacanassa iṇṇaṃ iṇṇannaṃ iccete ādesā honti tīhi saṅkhyāhi.
anya-e0802n2:170: Aggī, bhikkhū, rattī, yāgū, aṭṭhī, aṭṭhīni, āyū, āyūni, sabbāni, yāni, tāni, kāni, katamāni, etāni, apūni, imāni.
anya-e0802n2:171: Yosvīti kimatthaṃ? Aggi, bhikkhu, ratti, yāgu, sabbo, yo, so, ko, amuko.
anya-e0802n2:173: Punārambhaggahaṇaṃ kimatthaṃ? Niccadīpanatthaṃ. Aggī, bhikkhū, rattī, yāni, tāni, katamāni.
anya-e0802n2:176: Aggīsu, aggīnaṃ, aggīhi, rattīsu, rattīnaṃ, rattīhi. Bhikkhūsu, bhikkhūnaṃ, bhikkhūhi. Purisānaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:178: Caggahaṇamavadhāraṇatthaṃ. Sukhettesu brahmacārisu, dhammamakkhāsi bhagavā bhikkhunaṃ datvā sakehi pāṇibhi.
anya-e0802n2:181: Pañcasu, pañcannaṃ, pañcahi, chasu, channaṃ, chahi, sattasu, sattannaṃ, sattahi, aṭṭhasu, aṭṭhannaṃ, aṭṭhahi, navasu, navannaṃ, navahi, dasasu, dasannaṃ, dasahi.
anya-e0802n2:183: Attamitibhāvaniddeso ubhayassāgamanatthaṃ, anto ukāro attamāpajjate. Catassannaṃ itthīnaṃ. Tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:193: Caggahaṇena aññesu vacanesu attañca hoti. Guṇavantasmiṃ, guṇavantena.
anya-e0802n2:194: Antaggahaṇena ntupaccayassa anto attamāpajjate, yonañca ikāro hoti. Guṇavanti.
anya-e0802n2:196: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa attaṃ hoti vā aṃsaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:197: Satimaṃ bhikkhu, satimantaṃ bhikkhuṃ vā, bandhumaṃ rājānaṃ, bandhumantaṃ rājānaṃ vā, satimassa bhikkhuno, satimato bhikkhuno vā, bandhumassa rañño suṅkaṃ, bandhumato rañño vā suṅkaṃ deti.
anya-e0802n2:198: Etesvīti kimatthaṃ? Satimā bhikkhu, bandhumā rājā.
anya-e0802n2:200: Ntupaccayassa antassa attaṃ hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:204: Aggissantassa ini hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:205: Purato aggini, pacchato aggini, dakkhiṇato aggini, vāmato aggini.
anya-e0802n2:220: Mātulaiccevamādīnaṃ anto ānattamāpajjate īkāre paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:222: Īkāreti kimatthaṃ? Bhikkhunī, rājinī, jālinī, gahapatānī.
anya-e0802n2:223: Ānattaggahaṇena nadīiccetassa dīsaddassa jjojjā ādesā honti saha vibhattiyā yonāsaiccetesu. Najjo sandanti, najjā kataṃ taraṅgaṃ, najjā nerañjarāya tīre.
anya-e0802n2:225: Sabbato liṅgato smāhismiṃ iccetesaṃ mhābhimhiiccete ādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:226: Purisamhā, purisasmā, purisebhi, purisehi, purisamhi, purisasmiṃ.
anya-e0802n2:227: Smāhismiṃnamiti kimatthaṃ? Vaṇṇavantaṃ agandhakaṃ viruḷhapupphaṃ, mahantaṃ chattaṃ mahāchattaṃ, mahantaṃ dhajaṃ mahādhajaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:229: Ta imaiccetehi katākārehi smāsmiṃ naṃmhāmhiiccete ādesā neva honti.
anya-e0802n2:230: Asmā ṭhānā bhayaṃ uppajjati, asmiṃ ṭhāne bhayaṃ tiṭṭhati, asmā, asmiṃ.
anya-e0802n2:231: Katākārehīti kimatthaṃ? Tamhā, tamhi, imamhā, imamhi.
anya-e0802n2:234: Sabbesu, yesu, tesu, kesu, purisesu, imesu, kusalesu, tumhesu, amhesu, sabbehi, yehi, tehi, kehi, purisehi, imehi, kusalehi, tumhehi, amhehi.
anya-e0802n2:236: Sabbesaṃ sabbanāmānaṃ anto akāro ettamāpajjate naṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:237: Sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ, yesaṃ, yesānaṃ, tesaṃ, tesānaṃ, imesaṃ, imesānaṃ, kesaṃ, kesānaṃ, itaresaṃ, itaresānaṃ, katamesaṃ, katamesānaṃ. Sabbanāmānamiti kimatthaṃ? Buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo.
anya-e0802n2:243: Sabbena, yena, tena, kena, anena, purisena, rūpena.
anya-e0802n2:248: Sabbo, yo, so, ko, amuko, puriso.
anya-e0802n2:252: Tasmā akārato nāvacanassa soādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:253: Atthaso dhammaṃ jānāti, byañjanaso atthaṃ jānāti, akkharaso, suttaso, padaso, yasaso. Upāyaso, sabbaso, thāmaso, ṭhānaso.
anya-e0802n2:254: Vāti kimatthaṃ? Pādena vā pādārahena vā atirekapādena vā yo bhikkhu theyyacittena parassa bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāti, so bhikkhu pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso.
anya-e0802n2:260: Tasmā akārato sabbesaṃ yonīnaṃāe ādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:264: Akāratoti kimatthaṃ? Daṇḍino, aṭṭhīni, aggī pajjalanti, munī caranti.
anya-e0802n2:266: Tasmā akārato sabbesaṃ smāsmiṃiccetesaṃ ā e ādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:268: Akāratoti kimatthaṃ? Daṇḍinā, daṇḍismiṃ, bhikkhunā, bhikkhusmiṃ.
anya-e0802n2:270: Tasmā akārato catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:271: Atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ buddho loke uppajjati.
anya-e0802n2:275: Vāti kimatthaṃ? Dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā.
anya-e0802n2:278: Tehi sabbanāmehi akārantehi smāsmiṃ saiccetesaṃ tayo ā e āyādesā neva honti.
anya-e0802n2:279: Sabbasmā , sabbasmiṃ, sabbassa. Yasmā, yasmiṃ, yassa. Tasmā, tasmiṃ, tassa. Kasmā, kasmiṃ, kassa. Imasmā, imasmiṃ, imassa.
anya-e0802n2:283: Tasmā ghato nādīnamekavacanānaṃ vibhattigaṇānaṃ āyādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:284: Kaññāya kataṃ kammaṃ, kaññāya dīyate, kaññāya nissaṭaṃ vatthaṃ. Kaññāya pariggaho, kaññāya patiṭṭhitaṃ sīlaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:285: Ghatoti kimatthaṃ? Rattiyā, itthiyā, dhenuyā, vadhuyā.
anya-e0802n2:286: Nādīnamiti kimatthaṃ? Kaññaṃ passati, vijjaṃ, vīṇaṃ, gaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:287: Ekavacanānamiti kimatthaṃ? Sabbāsu, yāsu, tāsu, kāsu, imāsu, pabhāsu.
anya-e0802n2:289: Tasmā pato nādīnamekavacanānaṃ vibhattigaṇānaṃ yāādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:290: Rattiyā , itthiyā, deviyā, dhenuyā, yāguyā, vadhuyā.
anya-e0802n2:291: Nādīnamiti kimatthaṃ? Rattī, rattiṃ, itthī, itthiṃ.
anya-e0802n2:292: Patoti kimatthaṃ? Kaññāya, vīṇāya, gaṅgāya, pabhāya, sobhāya.
anya-e0802n2:295: Tasmā sakhato gassa akāra ākāra ikāra īkāra ekārādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n2:296: Bho sakha, bho sakhā, bho sakhi, bho sakhī, bho sakhe.
anya-e0802n2:299: Bhoti ayye, bhoti kaññe, bhoti kharādiye.
anya-e0802n2:302: Tato ammādito gassa ekārattaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0802n2:303: Bhoti ammā, bhoti annā, bhoti ambā, bhoti tātā.
anya-e0802n2:306: Tasmā akatarassā lato yvālapanassa vevoādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:310: Ālapanasseti kimatthaṃ? Te hetavo, te bhikkhavo.
anya-e0802n2:312: Tasmā jhalato sassa vibhattissa no ādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:313: Aggino, aggissa, sakhino, sakhissa, daṇḍino, daṇḍissa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhussa.
anya-e0802n2:317: Tehi ghapajhalaiccetehi yonaṃ lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:318: Kaññā, kaññāyo. Rattī, rattiyo, itthī, itthiyo, yāgū, yāguyo, vadhū, vadhuyo. Aggī, aggayo. Bhikkhū, bhikkhavo. Sayambhū, sayambhuvo. Aṭṭhī, aṭṭhīni, āyū, āyūni.
anya-e0802n2:321: Tasmā lato yonaṃ vokāro hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:323: Kāraggahaṇaṃ kimatthaṃ? Yonaṃ no ca hoti. Jantuno.
anya-e0802n2:324: Caggahaṇamavadhāraṇatthaṃ, amū purisā tiṭṭhanti, amū purise passatha.
anya-e0802n2:328: Sabbasseva amhasaddassa savibhattissa mamaṃ ādeso hoti se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:331: Sabbasseva amhasaddassa savibhattissa mayaṃādeso hoti yomhi paṭhame.
anya-e0802n2:337: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa ntoādeso hoti yomhi paṭhame.
anya-e0802n2:342: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa ntassādeso hoti vā se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:346: Sabbassevantupaccayassa savibhattissa āādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:347: Guṇavā, paññavā, sīlavā, balavā, dhanavā, matimā, satimā, dhitimā.
anya-e0802n2:351: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa aṃādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi napuṃsake vattamānassa.
anya-e0802n2:352: Guṇavaṃ cittaṃ tiṭṭhati, rucimaṃ pupphaṃ virocati.
anya-e0802n2:353: Simhīti kimatthaṃ? Vaṇṇavantaṃ agandhakaṃ virūḷhapupphaṃ passasi tvaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:355: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa aṃ avaṇṇā ca honti ge pare.
anya-e0802n2:356: Bho guṇavaṃ, bho guṇava, bho guṇavā.
anya-e0802n2:359: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa totitāādesā honti vā sasmiṃ nāiccetesu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:360: Guṇavato, guṇavantassa, guṇavati, guṇavantasmiṃ, guṇavatā, guṇavantena, satimato, satimantassa, satimati, satimantasmiṃ, satimatā, satimantena.
anya-e0802n2:363: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa taṃādeso hoti vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:365: Naṃmhīti kimatthaṃ? Guṇavanto tiṭṭhanti, satimanto tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0802n2:367: Sabbasseva imasaddassa savibhattissa idaṃādeso hoti vā aṃsisu napuṃsake vattamānassa.
anya-e0802n2:368: Idaṃ cittaṃ passasi, idaṃ cittaṃ tiṭṭhati, imaṃ cittaṃ passasi. Imaṃ cittaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0802n2:369: Nathuṃsaketi kimatthaṃ? Imaṃ purisaṃ passasi. Ayaṃ puriso tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0802n2:371: Sabbasseva amusaddassa savibhattissa aduṃādeso hoti aṃsisu napuṃsake vattamānassa.
anya-e0802n2:372: Aduṃ pupphaṃ passasi, aduṃ pupphaṃ virocati.
anya-e0802n2:373: Napuṃsaketi kimatthaṃ? Amuṃ rājānaṃ passasi, asu rājā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0802n2:377: Dvinnaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ itthipumanapuṃsake vattamānānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ dve hoti yoiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:378: Dve itthiyo, dve dhammā. Dve rūpāni.
anya-e0802n2:380: Caggahaṇena duve dvaya ubha ubhaya duvi ca honti yonāanamiccetesu. Duve samaṇā. Duve brāhmaṇā , duve janā, dvayena, dvayaṃ, ubhinnaṃ, ubhayesaṃ duvinnaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:381: 133, 230.Ti catunnaṃ tisso catasso tayo cattāro tīṇi cattāri.
anya-e0802n2:382: Ticatunnaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ itthipumanapuṃsake vattamānānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tisso catasso tayo cattāro tīṇi cattāriiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yoiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:383: Tisso vedanā catasso disā, tayo janā, jane, cattāro purisā, purise, tīṇi āyatanāni, cattāri ariyasaccāni.
anya-e0802n2:386: Pañcādīnaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ itthipumanapuṃsake vattamānānaṃ savibhattissa antassa sarassa akāro hoti yoiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:387: Pañca, pañca, cha, cha, satta, satta, aṭṭha, aṭṭha, nava, nava, dasa, dasa.
anya-e0802n2:390: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa rañño rājinoiccete ādesā honti se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:394: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññaṃādeso hoti vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:397: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññāādeso hoti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:398: Tena raññā kataṃ. Rājena vā kataṃ.
anya-e0802n2:401: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññerājiniiccete ādesā honti smiṃmhivibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:404: Sabbesaṃ tumha amha saddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayi mayiiccete ādeso honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ smiṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:406: Smiṃmhīti kimatthaṃ? Tvaṃ bhavasi, ahaṃ bhavāmi.
anya-e0802n2:408: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tvaṃ ahaṃiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:411: Caggahaṇena tuvaṃ ca hoti. Tuvaṃ satthā.
anya-e0802n2:413: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tavamamaiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:417: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tuyhaṃ mayhaṃiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:421: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ taṃ maiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ aṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:425: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tavaṃ mamaṃiccete ādesā honti navā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ aṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:430: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayā mayāiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:434: Sabbassa tumhasaddassa savibhattissa tuvaṃ tvaṃ iccete ādesā honti aṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:435: Kaliṅgarassa tuvaṃ maññe, kaṭṭhassa tvaṃ maññe.
anya-e0802n2:437: Sabbesaṃ tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yadā padasmā paresaṃ vo noādesā honti navā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dutiyā catutthīchaṭṭhīiccetesu bahuvacanesu.
anya-e0802n2:438: Pahāya vo bhikkhave gamissāmi, mā no ajja vikantiṃsu, rañño sūdā mahānase, evaṃ dutiyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:439: Dhammaṃ vo bhikkhave desessāmi, saṃvibhajetha no rajjena, evaṃ catutthyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:440: Tuṭṭhosmi vo bhikkhave pakatiyā, satthā no bhagavā anuppatto, evaṃ chaṭṭhyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:446: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yadā padasmā paresaṃ te me ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ catutthīchaṭṭhīiccetesu ekavacanesu.
anya-e0802n2:447: Dadāmi te gāmavarāni pañca, dadāhi me gāmavaraṃ, idaṃ te raṭṭhaṃ, ayaṃ me putto.
anya-e0802n2:448: Padatoti kimatthaṃ? Tava ñāti, mama ñāti.
anya-e0802n2:450: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yadā padasmā paresaṃ te meādesā na honti aṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:451: Passeyya taṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃ, so maṃ bravīti.
anya-e0802n2:453: Sabbesaṃ tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yadā padasmā paresaṃ temeādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tatiyekavacane pare.
anya-e0802n2:454: Kataṃ te pāpaṃ, kataṃ me pāpaṃ, kataṃ tayā pāpaṃ, kataṃ mayā pāpaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:455: Padatoti kimatthaṃ? Tayā kataṃ, mayā kataṃ.
anya-e0802n2:457: Sabbesaṃ tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yadā padasmā paresaṃ vonoādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tatiyābahuvacanesu paresu.
anya-e0802n2:458: Kataṃ vo kammaṃ, kataṃ no kammaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:459: Padatoti kimatthaṃ? Tumhehi kataṃ, amhehi kataṃ.
anya-e0802n2:460: Bahuvacanaggahaṇena yomhi paṭhame vo noādesā honti. Gāmaṃ vo gaccheyyātha, gāmaṃ no gaccheyyāma.
anya-e0802n2:462: Pumaiccevamantassa savibhattissa āādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:465: Antaggahaṇena maghava yuvaiccevamādīnamantassasavibhattissa āādeso hoti. Maghavā, yuvā.
anya-e0802n2:467: Pumaiccevamantassa savibhattissa aṃādeso hoti ālapanekavacane pare.
anya-e0802n2:472: Pumaiccevamantassa samāse ca aṃādeso hoti vibhāsā samāse kate.
anya-e0802n2:473: Itthī ca pumā ca napuṃsakaṃ ca itthipumanapuṃsakāni. Itthipumanapuṃsakānaṃ samūho itthipumanapuṃsakasamūho.
anya-e0802n2:476: Pumaiccevamantassa savibhattissa ānoādeso hoti yosu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0802n2:480: Pumaiccevamantassa savibhattissa āne ādeso hoti vā smiṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:486: Caggahaṇena maghava yuvaiccevamādīnamantassa ānaādeso hoti si yo aṃyo iccetesu vibhattīsu, pumakammathāmantassa cukāro hoti sasmā su vibhattīsu. Maghavāno, maghavānā. Maghavānaṃ, maghavāne . Yuvāno, yuvānā, yuvānaṃ, yuvāne, pumuno, pumunā. Kammuno, kammunā, thāmuno, thāmunā.
anya-e0802n2:491: Pumaiccevamantassa āuādesā honti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:495: Kammaiccevamantassa ca ua ādesā honti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:497: Caggahaṇena maghavayuvaiccevamantassa āāde so hoti kvaci nāsuiccetesu vibhattīsu. Maghavānā, maghavāsu, maghavesu, maghavena vā. Yuvānā, yuvāsu, yuvesu, yuvena vā.
anya-e0802n2:505: Tehi tumhaamhehi yo appaṭhamo ākaṃhoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:506: Tumhākaṃ passāmi, tumhe passāmi vā. Amhākaṃ passasi, amhe passasi vā.
anya-e0802n2:508: Appaṭhamoti kimatthaṃ? Gacchatha tumhe, gacchāma mayaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:509: Vātivikappanatthena yonaṃ aṃ ānaṃ honti. Tumhaṃ tumhānaṃ. Amhaṃ, amhānaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:511: Tehi humhaamhehi sassa vibhattissa aṃ ādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:512: Tumhaṃ dīyate, tava dīyate. Tumhaṃ pariggaho, tava pariggaho. Amhaṃ dīyate, mama dīyate. Amhaṃ pariggaho, mama pariggaho.
anya-e0802n2:515: Sabbesaṃ sabbanāmānaṃ akārato yo paṭhamo ettamāpajjate.
anya-e0802n2:516: Sabbe, ye, te, ke, tumhe, amhe, ime.
anya-e0802n2:517: Sabbanāmāti kimatthaṃ? Devā, asurā, nāgā, gandhabbā, manussā.
anya-e0802n2:519: Yoti kimatthaṃ? Sabbo, yo, so, ko, ayaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:522: Tasmā sabbanāma’kārato dvandaṭṭhā yo paṭhamo ettamāpajjate vā.
anya-e0802n2:530: Bahubbīhimhi ca samāse sabbanāmavidhānañca nāññaṃ kāriyaṃ hoti.
anya-e0802n2:532: Ceti kimatthaṃ? Sabbanāmavidhānaṃ hoti, dakkhiṇa pubbassaṃ, dakkhiṇapubbassā, uttarapubbassaṃ, uttarapubbassā.
anya-e0802n2:534: Sabbato sabbanāmato naṃvacanassa saṃsānaṃiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:535: Sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ, sabbāsaṃ, sabbāsānaṃ. Yesaṃ, yesānaṃ, yāsaṃ, yāsānaṃ. Tesaṃ, tesānaṃ, tāsaṃ, tāsānaṃ. Kesaṃ, kesānaṃ, kāsaṃ, kāsānaṃ. Imesaṃ, imesānaṃ, imāsaṃ, imāsānaṃ. Amūsaṃ, amūsānaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:536: Namiti kimatthaṃ? Sabbassa, yassa, tassa, kassa. Evaṃ sabbattha.
anya-e0802n2:543: Sabbasseva imasaddassa ekāro hoti vā sunaṃhiiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:544: Esu, imesu, esaṃ, imesaṃ, ehi, ebhi, imehi, imebhi.
anya-e0802n2:545: Imasseti kimatthaṃ? Etesu, etesaṃ, etehi, etebhi.
anya-e0802n2:547: Imasaddassa sabbasseva ana imiiccete ādesā honti nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:548: Anena dhammadānena. Sukhitā hotu sā pajā.
anya-e0802n2:550: Nāmhīti kimatthaṃ? Imesu, imesaṃ, imehi, imebhi.
anya-e0802n2:552: Imasaddassa sabbasseva anapuṃsakassa ayaṃādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:555: Simhīti kimatthaṃ? Imaṃ purisaṃ passasi tvaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:557: Amusaddassa anapuṃsakassa makāro sakāramāpajjate vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:558: Asu rājā, asu itthī, amuko rājā, amukā itthī.
anya-e0802n2:563: Eta taiccetesaṃ anapuṃsakānaṃ takāro sakāramāpajjate simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:564: Eso puriso, esā itthī, so puriso, sā itthī.
anya-e0802n2:565: Etatesamiti kimatthaṃ? Itaro puriso, itarā itthī.
anya-e0802n2:566: Anapuṃsakānamiti kimatthaṃ? Etaṃ cittaṃ, etaṃ rūpaṃ. Taṃ cittaṃ, taṃ rūpaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:568: Tassa sabbanāmassa takārassa nattaṃ hoti vā sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0802n2:569: Nāya, tāya, naṃ, taṃ, ne, te, nesu, tesu, namhi, tamhi, nāhi, tāhi, nābhi, tābhi.
anya-e0802n2:571: Tassa sabbanāmassa takārassa sabbasseva attaṃ hoti vā sasmāsmiṃ saṃsāiccetesu sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0802n2:572: Assa, tassa, asmā, tasmā, asmiṃ, tasmiṃ, assaṃ, tassaṃ, assā, tassā.
anya-e0802n2:576: Imasaddassa ca sabbasseva attaṃ hoti vā sasmāsmiṃ saṃ sāiccetesu sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0802n2:577: Assa , imassa, asmā, imasmā, asmiṃ, imasmiṃ, assaṃ, imissaṃ, assā, imissā.
anya-e0802n2:580: Sabbato sabbanāmato kakārāgamo hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:582: Vāti kimatthaṃ? Sabbo, yo, so, ko.
anya-e0802n2:584: Puna sabbatoggahaṇena aññasmāpi kakārāgamo hoti, hīnako, potako.
anya-e0802n2:586: Sabbato sabbanāmato ghapasaññato smiṃsaiccetesaṃ saṃsā ādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:587: Sabbassaṃ, sabbassā, sabbāyaṃ, sabbāya, imissaṃ, imissā, imāyaṃ, imāya, amussaṃ, amussā, amuyaṃ, amuyā.
anya-e0802n2:591: Etehi sabbanāmehi ghapasaññehi smiṃvacanassa neva āya yāādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:592: Etissaṃ, etāyaṃ, imissaṃ, imāyaṃ, amussaṃ, amuyaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:594: Etāhīti kimatthaṃ? Kaññāya, vīṇāya, gaṅgāya, kapālikāya.
anya-e0802n2:596: Tasmā manogaṇādito smiṃnāiccetesaṃ ikāraākārādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:597: Manasi, manusmiṃ, sirasi, sirasmiṃ, manasā, manena, vacasā, vacena, sirasā, sirena, sarasā, sarena, tapasā, tapena, vayasā, vayena, yasasā, yasena, tejasā, tejena, urasā, urena, thāmasā, thāmena.
anya-e0802n2:598: Smiṃnānamiti kimatthaṃ? Mano, siro, tamo, tapo, tejo.
anya-e0802n2:599: Ādiggahaṇena aññāsmāpi smiṃnānaṃ ikāraākārādesā honti, bilasi, bilasā, padasi, padasā.
anya-e0802n2:601: Tasmā manogaṇādito sassa ca okāro hoti.
anya-e0802n2:604: Etesaṃ manogaṇādīnaṃ anto ottamāpajjate vibhattilope kate.
anya-e0802n2:607: Lopeti kimatthaṃ? Padayā, tapasā, yasasā, vacasā, manasā, evamaññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n2:609: Eteheva manogaṇādīhi vibhattādese sare pare sakārāgamo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:613: Puna ādiggahaṇena aññasmimpi paccaye pare sakārāgamo hoti. Mānasikaṃ, vācasikaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:615: Sabbassa santasaddassa sakārādeso hoti bhakāre pare, ante ca bakārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0802n2:626: Caggahaṇaṃ kvaci sakārasseva pasiddhatthaṃ. Sakkāro, sakkato.
anya-e0802n2:629: Gacchaṃ, gacchanto, mahaṃ, mahanto, caraṃ, caranto, khādaṃ, khādanto.
anya-e0802n2:630: Gacchantādīnamiti kimatthaṃ? Anto, danto, vanto, santo.
anya-e0802n2:633: Gacchato, mahato, gacchati, mahati, gacchatā, mahatā.
anya-e0802n2:634: Sesesūti kimatthaṃ? Gacchaṃ, mahaṃ, caraṃ, khādaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:636: Brahma atta sakha rājaiccevamādito aṃvacanassa ānaṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:637: Brahmānaṃ, brahmaṃ, attānaṃ, attaṃ, sakhānaṃ, sakhaṃ, rājānaṃ, rājaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:640: Brahma atta sakha rājaiccevamādito sivacanassa ā ca hoti.
anya-e0802n2:643: Brahmaatta sakha rājaiccevamādito yonaṃ ānoādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:646: Tasmā sakhato ca yonaṃ āyo no ādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:650: Tasmā sakhato smiṃvacanassa ekāro hoti. Sakhe.
anya-e0802n2:652: Tasmā brahmato gassa ca ekāro hoti. He brahme.
anya-e0802n2:658: Tassa sakhantassa āro hoti vā himhi vibhattimhi. Sakhārehi, sakhehi.
anya-e0802n2:660: Tassa sakhantassa āro hoti vā sunaṃ aṃiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:661: Sakhāresu, sakhesu, sakhārānaṃ, sakhīnaṃ, sakhāraṃ, sakhaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:663: Tasmā brahmato smiṃvacanassa niādeso hoti. Brahmani.
anya-e0802n2:664: Tuggahaṇena abrahmatopi smiṃ vacanassa ni hoti. Kammani, cammani, muddhani.
anya-e0802n2:670: Satthupituādīnamanto attamāpajjate sismiṃ, silopo ca hoti.
anya-e0802n2:672: Sisminti kimatthaṃ? Satthussa, pitussa, mātussa, bhātussa, kattussa.
anya-e0802n2:675: Satthāraṃ, pitaraṃ, mātaraṃ, bhātaraṃ, kattāraṃ, satthārehi, pitarehi, mātarehi, bhātarehi, kattārehi.
anya-e0802n2:676: Aññesvīti kimatthaṃ? Satthā, pitā, mātā, bhātā, kattā.
anya-e0802n2:680: Vāti kimatthaṃ? Satthānaṃ, pitūnaṃ, mātūnaṃ, bhātūnaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:682: Tassa satthusaddassa anto attamāpajjate vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:684: Vāti kimatthaṃ? Satthārānaṃ, pitarānaṃ, mātarānaṃ, bhātarānaṃ, dhītarānaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:687: Satthupituiccevamādīnamantassa uttaṃ hoti vā sasmiṃ, salopo ca.
anya-e0802n2:688: Satthu , satthussa, satthuno dīyate, pariggaho vā. Pitu, pitussa, pituno dīyate, pariggaho vā. Bhātu, bhātussa, bhātuno dīyate, pariggaho vā.
anya-e0802n2:691: Sakkamandhātuiccevamādīnamanto uttamāpajjate sasmiṃ, salopo ca hoti.
anya-e0802n2:692: Sakkamandhātu iva assa rājino vibhavo. Evaṃ kattu, gantu, dātu iccevamādī.
anya-e0802n2:696: Tato ārādesato sabbesaṃ yo naṃ okārādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:697: Satthāro, pitaro, mātaro, bhātaro, kattāro, vattāro.
anya-e0802n2:698: Tuggahaṇena aññasmāpi yonaṃ okāro hoti. Caturo janā, gāvo, ubho purisā.
anya-e0802n2:701: Satthari, pitari, mātari, dhītari, bhātari, kattari, vattari.
anya-e0802n2:702: Puna tatogahaṇena aññasmāpi smiṃvacanassa ikāro hoti. Bhuvi.
anya-e0802n2:705: Satthārā, pitarā, mātarā, bhātarā, dhītarā, kattārā, vattārā.
anya-e0802n2:708: Satthari, pitari, mātari, dhītari, kattari, vattari.
anya-e0802n2:711: Pitarā, mātarā, bhātarā, mītarā pitaro, mātaro, bhātaro, dhītaro.
anya-e0802n2:712: Asimhiggahaṇaṃtomhi pare ikārādesañāpanatthaṃ. Mātito, pitito, bhātito, duhitito.
anya-e0802n2:720: Tassa attano anto anattamāpajjate himhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:724: Anattamitibhāvaniddesena attasaddassa sakādeso hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu. Sako, sakā, sakaṃ, sake.
anya-e0802n2:726: Tato attato smiṃvacanassa ni hoti. Attani.
anya-e0802n2:728: Tatoattato sassa vibhattissa no hoti, attano.
anya-e0802n2:730: Tato attato smā vacanassa nā hoti. Attanā.
anya-e0802n2:731: Puna tatogahaṇena tassa attano takārasseva rakāro hoti sabbesu vacanesu. Atrajo, atrajaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:737: Tasmā ghapato smiṃ vacanassa yaṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:738: Kaññāyaṃ , kaññāya. Rattiyaṃ, rattiyā. Itthiyaṃ, itthiyā. Yāguyaṃ, yāguyā. Vakhuyaṃ, vadhuyā.
anya-e0802n2:740: Sabbesaṃ yonaṃ ni hoti vā napuṃsakehi liṅgehi.
anya-e0802n2:744: Akārantehi napuṃsakaliṅgehi yonaṃ ni hoti niccaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:745: Yāni, yāni. Tāni, tāni. Kāni, kāni. Bhayāni, bhayāni. Rūpāni, rūpāni.
anya-e0802n2:747: Akārantehi napuṃsakaliṅgehi sivacanassa aṃ hoti niccaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:750: Tato niddiṭṭhehi ligehi sesakhatā gasiiccete lopamāpajjante.
anya-e0802n2:751: Bhoti itthi, sā itthī. Bho daṇḍi, so daṇḍī. Bho sattha, so satthā. Bho rāja, so rājā. Sesatoti kimatthaṃ? Puriso gacchati.
anya-e0802n2:754: Sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ ekavacanabahuvacanānaṃ paṭhamā dutiyātatiyā catutthī pañcamī chaṭṭhī sattamīnaṃ lopo hoti, āvuso upasagga nipātaiccevamādīhi ca,
anya-e0802n2:755: Tvaṃ panāvuso, tumhe panāvuso, padaso dhammaṃ vāceyya, vihāraṃ sve upagaccheyya.
anya-e0802n2:756: Pa, parā, ni, nī, u, du, saṃ, vi, ava, anu, pari, adhi, abhi, pati, su, ā, ati, api, apa, upa, pahāro, parābhavo, nihāro, nīhāro, uhāro, duhāro, saṃhāro, vihāro, avahāro, anuhāro, parihāro, adhihāro, abhihāro, patihāro, suhāro, āhāro, atihāro, apihāro, apahāro, upahāro, evaṃ vīsati upasaggehi ca.
anya-e0802n2:757: Yathā, tathā, evaṃ, khalu, kho, tatra, atho, atha, hi, tu ca, vā, vo, haṃ, abhaṃ, alaṃ, eva, ho aho, he , ahe, re, are, evamādīhi nipātehi ca yojetabbāni.
anya-e0802n2:760: Pumaiccetassa anto lopamāpajjate liṅgādīsu parapadesu samāsesu.
anya-e0802n2:766: Aṃ vacanassa yaṃ hoti vā īto pasaññato.
anya-e0802n2:771: Tasmā jhato katarassā aṃ vacanassa naṃ hoti.
anya-e0802n2:776: Sabbesaṃ yonaṃ jhato katarassā no hoti.
anya-e0802n2:777: Daṇḍino bhogino, he daṇḍino, he bhogino.
anya-e0802n2:782: Tasmā jhato katarassā smiṃvacanassa niāde so hoti.
anya-e0802n2:786: Kimiccetassa ko ca hoti vapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:788: Caggahaṇena avapaccaye parepi ko ca hoti. Ko taṃninditu marahati, kathaṃ bodhayituṃ dhammaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:791: Kimiccetassa ku hoti hiṃ haṃiccetesu ca. Kuhiṃ gacchasi, kulaṃ gacchasi.
anya-e0802n2:792: Caggahaṇena hiñcanaṃdācanaṃ paccayesu paresu aññatthāpi ku hoti. Kuhiñcanaṃ, kudācanaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:794: Kimiccetassa ko hoti sesesu vibhattipaccayesu paresu.
anya-e0802n2:795: Ko pakāro kathaṃ, kaṃ pakāraṃ kathaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:798: Kimiccetassa ku hoti tratotha iccetesu ca.
anya-e0802n2:802: Sabbassa etasaddassa akāro hoti vā tothaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:805: Sabbassa etasaddassa akāro hoti niccaṃ trapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:808: Sabbassa etasaddassa ekāro hoti vā tothaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:810: 234, 265.Imassi thaṃ dāni ha to dhesu ca.
anya-e0802n2:811: Imasaddassa sabbasseva ikāro hoti thaṃ dānihato dhaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:814: Imasaddassa sabbasseva akāro hoti dhunāmhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:818: Sabbasseva imasaddassa etādeso hoti rahimhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:824: Nadādito vāanadāditovā itthiyaṃ vattamānāya īpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n2:825: Nadī, mahī, kumārī, taruṇī, sakhī, itthī.
anya-e0802n2:827: Ṇava ṇika ṇeyya ṇa ntuiccetehi itthiyaṃ vattamānehi īpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n2:828: Māṇavī, paṇḍavī, nāvikī, venateyyī, kunteyyī, gotamī, guṇavatī, sāmāvatī.
anya-e0802n2:830: Pati bhikkhu rājīkārantehi itthiyaṃ vattamānehi inīpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n2:831: Gahapatānī, bhikkhunī, rājinī, hatthinī, daṇḍinī, medhāvinī, tapassinī.
anya-e0802n2:833: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa takāro hoti vā īkāre pare.
anya-e0802n2:834: Guṇavatī, guṇavantī, kulavatī, kulavantī, satimatī. Satimantī, mahatī, mahantī, gottamatī, gottamantī.
anya-e0802n2:836: Sabbasseva bhavantasaddassa bhotādeso hoti īkāre itthigate pare.
anya-e0802n2:837: Bhoti ayye, bhoti kaññe, bhoti kharādiye.
anya-e0802n2:839: Sabbasseva bhavantasaddassa bhoādeso hoti ge pare.
anya-e0802n2:840: Bho purisa, bho aggi, bho rāja, bho sattha, bho daṇḍi, bho sayambhu.
anya-e0802n2:842: Tuggahaṇena aññasmimpi vacane sabbassa bhavantasaddassa bhonta bhante bhonto bhadde bhotā bho toiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:843: Bhonta, bhante, bhonto, bhadde, bhotā, bhoto.
anya-e0802n2:845: Akāro ca pitādīnamanto ca attamāpajjate ge pare.
anya-e0802n2:846: Bho purisā, bho rājā, bho pitā, bho mātā, bho satthā.
anya-e0802n2:849: Bho daṇḍi, bho sayambhu, bhoti itthi, bhotivadhu,
anya-e0802n2:852: Bho rāja, bho rājā, bho atta, bho attā, bho sakha, bho sakhā, bho sattha, bho satthā.
anya-e0802n2:856: Toādi yesaṃ paccayānaṃ, te honti tvādayo. Te paccayā tvādayo vibhattisaññāva daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0802n2:857: Sabbato, yato, tato, kuto, ato, ito, sabbadā, yadā, tadā, kadā, idha, idāni.
anya-e0802n2:860: Sabbato, yato, tato, kuto, ato, ito.
anya-e0802n2:863: Trathaiccete paccayā honti sattamyatthe sabba nāmehi.
anya-e0802n2:864: Sabbatra, sabbattha, yatra, yattha, tatra, tattha.
anya-e0802n2:866: Sabbaiccetasmā dhipaccayo hoti kvaci sattamyatthe. Sabbadhi, sabbasmiṃ.
anya-e0802n2:874: Tamhā ca hi haṃiccete paccayā honti sattamyatthe. Tahiṃ, tahaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:877: Imasmā hadhaiccete paccayā honti sattamyatthe. Iha, idha.
anya-e0802n2:880: Tasmā yato hiṃpaccayo hoti sattamyatthe. Yahiṃ.
anya-e0802n2:884: Kiṃ sabbaañña eka ya kuiccetehi dā dācanaṃiccete paccayā honti kāle sattamyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:885: Kadā, sabbadā, aññadā, ekadā, yadā, kudācanaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:887: Taiccetasmā dāni dāiccete paccayā honti, kāle sattamyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:891: Imasmā rahi dhunā dāniiccete paccayā honti kāle sattamyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:895: Sabbaiccetassa sakārādeso hoti vā dāmhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:899: Bāhussaccaṃ, paṇḍiccaṃ, vepullaṃ, kāruññaṃ, kosallaṃ, sāmaññaṃ, sohajjaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:901: Sabbasseva vuḍḍhasaddassa joādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:904: Sabbasseva pasatthasaddassa soādeso hoti, jādeso ca iyaiṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:907: Sabbassa antikasaddassa nedādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:910: Sabbassa bāḷhasaddassa sādhādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:913: Sabbassa appasaddassa kaṇa ādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:916: Sabbassa yuvasaddassa kaṇa ādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:920: Vantumantuvīiccetesaṃ paccayānaṃ lopo hoti iyaiṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:921: Guṇiyo, guṇiṭṭho, satiyo, satiṭṭho, medhiyo, medhiṭṭho.
anya-e0802n2:922: 269, 401.Yavataṃ ta la ṇa dakārānaṃ byañjanāni ca la ña jakārattaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:923: Yakāravantānaṃ ta la ṇa dakārānaṃ byañjanāni ca la ña jakārattamāpajjante yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:924: Bāhussaccaṃ, paṇḍiccaṃ, vepullaṃ, kāruññaṃ, kosallaṃ, nepuññaṃ, sāmaññaṃ, sohajjaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:926: Ta la ṇa dakārānamiti kimatthaṃ? Ālasyaṃ, ārogyaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:930: Amha tumhanturāja brahma atta sakha satthu pituiccevamādīhi smāvacanaṃ nāva daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0802n2:931: Mayā, tayā, guṇavatā, raññā, brahmunā, attanā, sakhinā, satthārā, pitarā, mātarā, bhātarā, dhītarā, kattārā, vattārā.
